name: Siebel: Avoid Business Objects referencing too many Business Components
description:
The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
The parameter name is "Siebel: Max Buscomp", and the default value is 50.
output:
This rule reports Business Objects referencing too many Business Components.
It provides the following information:
- Business Object full name
- Number of Business Components referenced
rationale: Too many underlying Business Components in an Business Object results in an above average cost to modify the Business Component
remediation: Review the design and try to reduce the number of Business Components in the Business Object
total: Number of added or modified Business Objects
alternativeName: Siebel: Avoid Business Objects referencing too many Business Components
